componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This organisation is under Administration / Liquidation. The Administrator / Liquidator should be the contact for this provider.

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Point of Contact' AND is_Inactive__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Point of Contact' AND is_Inactive__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Point of Contact' AND is_Inactive__c = true

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Provider to Administrative Organisation' AND Account_Relationship_Status__c = 'Active'

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Provider to Management Company' AND Account_Relationship_Status__c = 'Active'

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Provider to Service Delivery Organisation' AND Account_Relationship_Status__c = 'Active'

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Provider to Administrative Organisation' AND Account_Relationship_Status__c = 'Inactive'

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Provider to Management Company' AND Account_Relationship_Status__c = 'Inactive'

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Provider to Service Delivery Organisation' AND Account_Relationship_Status__c = 'Inactive'

componentInstanceProperties.name: recordtype
componentInstanceProperties.value: Caretype Application - Not Required - Taken To Be Approved

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Service_Status__c = 'Operational' OR Service_Status__c = 'Pre-Operational' OR Service_Status__c = 'Inactive' OR Service_Status__c = 'Offline – Temporary Closure of Facility' OR Service_Status__c = 'Offline' OR Service_Status__c = 'Offline – Permanent Closure of Facility')AND Association_End_Date__c = null)

componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Service_Status__c = 'Service Record Closed' OR Service_Status__c = 'Closed - Combined' OR Service_Status__c = 'Closed') AND Association_End_Date__c = null)
